thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Cathy Tillotson
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Cathy Tillotson

author: Cathy Tillotson
title: Cathy Tillotson
text:
This is the second time I booked through (Aly) at Go Away Travel It was perfect everywhere we had to go all the flights we had to take were all right on time We didn't have to do anything The people in South Pacific were all so friendly and helpful We started in Cooks Island for one month to see if we would do winters there It is on the top of my list now had an amazing time there Then we were off to Turtle Island we were to get there by sea plane but because of weather we had to go by boat it took 6 hrs and was not a good choice As soon as we arrived we let manager know we are not leaving until there is a plane he said ok Came time to leave and the plane came what a difference it only took 30 minutes Then we were in Figi where we staid for four days What an amazing trip and I will do it again when my husband is well because he had a major problem with his hip so he was in wheel chair all the time so we did not get to see much but what we did see was beautiful and I think every one should experience Turtle Island once in there life
Cathy & Ted
